slides.text: A totally original Arturia design, Delay Eternity takes a deceptively simple digital delay and transforms it into something breathtaking.

slides.name: granular drums
slides.desc: Deconstruct and make a mess out of any source in real time! LFO modulations twist the delay, the fade mode keeps the pitch steady when changing delay time.

slides.name: repeater synth
slides.desc: Use the powerful modulation routing to make your instruments delay or repeat only at set times in the bar, perfectly sync'd to your DAW.

slides.name: dynamic pitch guitar
slides.desc: You can get totally bizarre, forced-pitch melodic parts using the pitch-levelling “repitch” mode, being controlled by the deep modulation. Bizarre, and hugely fun.
